info.name: The Colorado Sun Dark Theme
info.description: This is a dark theme for The Colorado Sun publication. Due to the limitations of Userstyles.org, the quality of the uploaded screenshots are not good. See screenshots below for high resolution images. Home page screenshot Article page screenshot
info.additionalInfo: 1.3.2 - Nav search styled - Yellow emphasis text box fix --------- 1.3 - Fixed text & link colors within article emphasis areas with yellow background - Altered article cards bottom borders to better reflect CO Sun theme - Themed tag and category buttons --------- 1.2 - Improved contrast for 'opinion' tagged articles - Changed 'Become A Member' button to dark text - Enhanced navigation menu hover and focus contast - Fixed byline author email links to yellow as blue is too hard to read with dark background - Fixed credibility indicators' color to light on dark --------- Second release - 1.1 Fixed text and link colors on yellow background --------- First release - 1.0 Themed home page and articles Article data embed themed best as possible, might revisit Home page screenshot Article page screenshot
